title: #1548 A Coding Error
itunes:title: #1548 A Coding Error
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing some of the Covid numbers when it comes to death in children and what kind of things motivated those numbers and the reporting on them. They then turn to the phones and speak with a caller with a theory about those who identify with the left being addicted to drama. They also discuss education and how people can acquire intelligence by way of osmosis as opposed to traditional learning, leading to a conversation about the difference between intelligence and talent.
